valueBlocks.label: Performance
valueBlocks.description: Increases the quality of products and services

valueStatements.statement: Provides my organization with high quality products or services
Expands easily to additional demand, processes, or tasks
Provides my organization with innovative capabilities
Helps my organization integrate different facets of our business
Reduces complexity and keeps things simple for my organization

Helps my organization connect with others internally and externally
Goes above and beyond standard products or services (e.g. allows customized products or services)

valueBlocks.label: Productivity
valueBlocks.description: Increases efficiency and information throughout my organization

valueStatements.statement: Helps my organization get things done with less effort
Helps my organization avoid hassles
Saves time for my organization (e.g. improves time to value)
Helps my organization feel knowledgeable and informed
Provides transparency to my organization
Is an expert in the products or services it provides to my organization
Is committed to the success of my organization
Responds promptly and professionally to my organization's needs
Fits well with my organization's culture and people

Helps me and my colleagues to grow and develop personally
Is personally enjoyable to work with or otherwise rewarding
